metadata.Title: CVE-2021-40530 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium.
metadata.Description: The ElGamal implementation in Crypto++ through 8.5 allows plaintext recovery because, during interaction between two cryptographic libraries, a certain dangerous combination of the prime defined by the receiver's public key, the generator defined by the receiver's public key, and the sender's ephemeral exponents can lead to a cross-configuration attack against OpenPGP.

criterions.comment: libcrypto++ package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
